description:
Experience the original adventures of the Treflik Family. Get ready for a wholesome journey through childhood. A new Nintendo Switchâ„¢ children's show is here!

VALUABLE LIFE LESSONS

Get to know these adorable characters and watch them learn valuable friendship, respect, honesty, and tolerance.

A COLORFUL WORLD

Journey through your favorite adventures of The Treflik Family. Put your spin on these stories through the Coloring Book section and give them your unique look.
name: The Treflik Family
